People and rescue boats line a street at the east Sam Houston Tollway as rescues continue from flooding following Tropical Storm Harvey PERIOD Melissa PhillipHouston Chronicle via AP

The UTA community is bindingtogether to help students impacted by the damages following Hurricane Harvey PERIOD

Harvey made landfall Aug PERIOD  along the Texassoutheastern coastline and arrived inHouston as a tropical storm PERIOD It stalled over the city causing major flooding to the area PERIOD

Students affected by the storm can get help from the university through the Emergency Assistance Fund President Vistasp Karbhari said PERIOD

The fund varies dailybased ondonations brought in and funds provided said Heather Snow associate vice president and dean of students in an email PERIOD Students can receive up to  but the average awarded isabout  PERIOD

Funds are given based on hardship from a sudden emergency or accident and the students future at the institution must be in jeopardy if they do not receive the assistance PERIOD

To apply students need to complete an online application PERIOD Students will then meet with a representative and may be asked to provide documents verifying their finances and need for help PERIOD

A few hundred students have been helped through the Vice President of Student Affairs Office since early last week said Lisa Nagy interim vice president for Student Affairs in an email PERIOD

We are working with impacted students by helping them by partnering with the colleges to provide class accommodations assignment extensions counseling support and emergency assistance funds Nagy said PERIOD

Several organizations on campus are collecting donations PERIOD Students who have been impacted can also receive help from the Counseling and Psychological Services office PERIOD

We will do everything we can do to help Karbhari said PERIOD This is the Maverick family and if we dont do that then there is something wrong. samanthaDouty
